 2003-00732003-01-30,  ,  F&O,  TC,  , 
ActCanada Shipping Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the SMALL VESSEL REGULATIONS by allowing boaters to use inflatable pouch-type personal floatation devices on all types of pleasure craft, adding a definition of muffler to the Regulations and by clarifying the wording of section 37 concerning noise created by the operation of a small power-driven vessel.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2003-0040 Publication Date: 2003-02-12
